content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, could you please provide me with more information about your budget and the length of the rental agreement? This will help me to determine a fair and competitive price for the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 400 Euros per month. The rental agreement will be for 12 months. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, I am afraid that a monthly rental price of 400 Euros is not feasible for me. The apartment is only 25 square meters, and my goal is to maximize my gains. Based on the current market rates in the area, I would need to charge a higher rent in order to make a profit. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but I am unable to accept your offer at this time.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. Can you give me a counteroffer?

Please keep in mind that I am a student and dependable, so I am willing to negotiate a fair price.

Also, I don't want to be on bad terms with my landlord, so I am willing to compromise.

Please let me know your counteroffer.

Thank you.

Best regards,

Maria Mamani
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your understanding, Maria. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate a fair price. Based on the current market rates in the area, I would need to charge a monthly rental price of 600 Euros in order to make a profit. However, I am willing to consider a lower rental price if you are able to provide a longer rental agreement or if you are able to pay a higher security deposit. I would be happy to discuss these options further with you if you are interested.
name: Heinrich Heine
